page.title: 15HOME LIFE IN TYDD ST.GILES
page.content: At home mum does the cleaning with a hoover and a duster.Mum does the cooking in an electric oven as we have no gas round here.At home mum does the ironing with a steam iron.She does the washing in a washing machine and sometimes by hand.Mum does the shopping in Kings Lynn or Wisbech in the Supermarket. At home dad does quite a lot of gardening .He grows vegetables, strawberries and flowers. He uses a hoe, rake, spade and a fork.In the garage dad mends the car. When my dad has nothing to do he will sit down and read the newspaper.My dad does quite alot of strawberry picking. In the evening we sometimes like to play dominoes.In our spare time we watch television.We often go for a ride to the seaside at Hunstanton or to walk in the woods at Sandringham.
